subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: For the third straight time in a quarterfinal of a Grand Slam event, Justine Henin overwhelmed Serena Williams, this time by a score of 7-6 (3), 6-1 to advance to the semifinals.
snippet: For the third straight time in a quarterfinal of a Grand Slam event, Justine Henin overwhelmed Serena Williams, this time by a score of 7-6 (3), 6-1 to advance to the semifinals.
